website_summaries.verdict: ANGGO dive fins are easily adjusted to snugly fit your feet, their shorter blades make gliding across the surface a breeze, and their vibrant neon colors provide excellent visibility on the water, making them great for beginners and veteran divers alike.
pros: 4 sizes available, from small to extra-large
cons: These dive fins are designed to be similar to your shoe size, but some swimmers may need to fill out the fin with thick socks

customer_reviews.title: Great fins for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: These were fantastic. I wear a size 8 (women's) and these fit great. Not tight but snug enough so they didn't fall off. Bought these for our snorkeling in Colombia and made a huge difference with maneuverability while snorkeling. Lightweight and easy to carry. Built pretty well. They held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Christian R.

customer_reviews.title: What a difference having good quality, well fitting fins makes
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait so long? I've traveled with my own snorkel and mask for years but normally rented fins once at our destination because I didn't want to use suitcase space for fins. Decided to get these for our last trip, and wow! What a difference having good quality, well fitting fins makes! While the rental fins were always okay, I'm now spoiled by these great fitting and super comfortable fins. Could not get over how comfortable there were. They will definitely go with me on future snorkel trips, and they really don't take up much space at all.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Ann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I got the Mediums and I'm a US Women's 8.5-9.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Tried these out in the local pool. They are a soft silicon feel on the inside and are kind to my neuropathy. Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: A Williams

customer_reviews.title: Affordble snorkeling fins
customer_reviews.text: These fins are for swimming and snorkeling ONLY. They are of good quality, lightweight and perfect for travel. I used them for scuba diving and found myself struggling. They do not give that much propulsion while under water. These fins do the job for swimming and snorkeling.!
customer_reviews.author: Karl Fiesta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fins for travel
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in black and pink for my husband and is trip to Fiji. We wanted fins we could easily put in a backpack and these worked great. We snorkeled for hours every day for 8 days and were so happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.author: KLF

customer_reviews.title: Nice material
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be well made but the sizing chart isn't accurate. I don't have enough time to reorder or exchange before my trip. so, I will be stuck wearing socks with them. I wear a 6.5 in women's shoes. I ordered a small. I can easily wear two pairs of thick socks with these. They are easy to walk in and don't put pressure on my toenails. more than likely I will order a smaller pair and give this one to my sister. They are very sturdy. I love that they come with shapers. The shapers have loops on them. I love that added grab and go feature.
customer_reviews.author: FloridianSnack

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. I had ordered them in large because that is what the guide said but they were too big. I returned them without hassle and ordered the mediums and they fit perfect (I wear 8.5 to 9 US womens).
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pool fins
customer_reviews.text: Love this fins !!! I got them for lap swimming and they work perfectly. I wear a size 8.5 shoe and the medium fins are a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Rio

customer_reviews.title: Way too wide for me
customer_reviews.text: Too wide for my narrow foot, but they might fit wide feet well. Length was just right. The foot box is stiff and I didn't find comfortable. Combining that with the extra width, I felt they would likely rub blisters so I didn't keep them. But they might be just fine for someone else. Really, not very many people have narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Nadele Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: I love smaller fins
customer_reviews.text: These fins are great for exercising in the pool and I will try them the next time I snorkel (oh, that heavenly but distant future where one can board a plane and fly to an island). I am a woman with a size 7 1/2 foot (wide foot, mind you). The mediums fit extremely well. I've used them three times now. I may change this review after a period of time has passed. I'm thinking that wearing socks to prevent chafing for long periods in the water may prove helpful. They don't rub for my shorter stints of exercise--but, you know how it is when you start snorkeling: time disappears.
customer_reviews.author: K. Finley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice, just make sure if you buy Small its 5-6 US size, which worked for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Ola

customer_reviews.title: Nice smaller alternative for fun snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: Did not want to carry large fins in the airplane and instead bought these for snorkeling. Worked well. OK, you are a little less fast, but its sufficient for underwater sightseeing. Nive fit, good quality. Comes in a carry bag (net) and inlets that keep the fins in shape while transporting. Does also work with boogie board.
customer_reviews.author: Angler Fish

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is too big
customer_reviews.text: I have yet used these find but upon initial receipt I like them. Only complaint is the sizing. I wear a women's 6.5 in shoes so I ordered the 5-6 and they are too big. My friend has fat feet and wear a size 8 and even she said they are too big. I got swim socks to wear under them so I think they will fine. Updates to come. Update: they fit perfectly with the swim socks under them. Wore them to the beach Saturday and they worked awesome. I love being able to walk and not trip. Exactly what I wanted! Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: TracZo

customer_reviews.title: Compact yet powerful fins!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome flipper set for traveling! I used these on two different trips - they fit nicely in carryon luggage and are better than plain swimming - I could tell the difference they helped make in moving in the water as I didn't use them once and regretted it.
customer_reviews.author: AliJ3

customer_reviews.title: Just right for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace some longer fins that were hard to pack in my luggage. These gave me plenty of power for snorkeling, they were far easier to put on and maneuver in than the longer fins, and were comfortable on my feet. I wear a women's size 8. They might have been ok without, but I wore a cotton sock to give me a slightly tighter fit.
customer_reviews.author: phk

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and helpful in the water
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a recent trip to Aruba, and am really glad I did. They were very helpful for navigating some of the stronger currents we encountered this time around. They were also super comfortable, and I never had to worry about them coming off. I should note that I used them with neoprene socks (FunToes Snorkel Fin Socks) and they went together perfectly. I am a true size 10 in women's shoes/11 in sneakers, and I ordered the size L. I wish the mesh carrier was a little bigger so I could get these in and out of there a bit easier, but I managed...
customer_reviews.author: mango

customer_reviews.title: Great fin get smaller size than normal shoe size
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 6 1/2 to 7 shoe normal width. The recommendations to buy smaller size is correct. Bought a small/5-6 fit and the are perfect! I wear with a neoprene bootie call ed an instamarine bought on amazon, size small as well. Great fit together and snug. If I wear without the boogie it has room but won’t slip off your feet. Really like these. Had zoomers before and these are more light weight! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi K

customer_reviews.title: 2 pair performed fine but the 3rd
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 pair of these for our Hawaii trip. 2 pair performed fine but the 3rd, mine, fell apart after just a few uses. The hard blue plastic and black rubber separated making less and less efficient each time I used them. With just a few uses they are now worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Burdette

customer_reviews.title: Best find ever!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough great things about these fins! They are extremely comfortable, don’t rub anywhere on my feet, fit very well and work amazingly! I wore them while snorkeling in the Caribbean and it took surprisingly little effort to propel myself through the water. I have rheumatoid arthritis and for some reason it hurts my ankle joints to wear regular long fins. I think the water puts too much pressure on my ankles when moving the fins up and down. These don’t bother my joints at all and I couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie90630

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION - Size chart is wrong for women
customer_reviews.text: size chart says small will fit US women 6-7, which is not true. MAYBE 7-8, but more likely 8-9, and definitely too big for a 6.5, by a lot . those folks saying they were loose, are wrong to advise that that is 'okay' - as fins should be snug.
customer_reviews.author: mallione

customer_reviews.title: Great for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: Easier to walk in. Great for snorkeling. Good quality. Used with watersocks and they were very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Webster

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, good fit but not adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: These were fine. Nothing really wrong with them but I did end up returning as I decided the fins that adjust are more cost efficient than ones my son will outgrow in a year. However $8 was taken out of the return for shipping. I’ve never had to deal with this as a prime member so I’ll have to remember not to buy from this particular company. In terms of product if you like the details of the product you’ll be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Monica F.

customer_reviews.title: These were great for my recent trip to PR
customer_reviews.text: These were great for my recent trip to PR. Easy to pack, lightweight, and did the job for a basic snorkeler like me. They fit nicely in a carry on and in a backpack or day bag without feeling overwhelmed.
customer_reviews.author: Kswiss

customer_reviews.title: Great for an enclosed pool; consider larger fins in the ocean.
customer_reviews.text: These fins are perfect for exercising in pools or enclosed water. However, if you plan on snorkeling in areas with stronger currents, consider larger fins -- or be ready for a QUALITY workout. I was in the Caribbean and snorkeled out 150 meters. Worked fine on the way out (with the current). However, coming back in, the smaller fins blades made fighting the current quite the workout. Imagine kicking strong for 1 min and making 20 meters of progress, but losing 5 meters (as the current pulled me back a bit) while taking a 10 second break. Other than that, quality is fine. Fit is a little large, but perfect if you pair with neoprene fin socks.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great for swim workout
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for lap swimming, for greater resistance. The quality is excellent and it's nice to have the mesh bag to hang them from my locker at the gym. I'm completely happy with them. Sizing was a bit of a concern, but I lucked out and ordered the right size. I am very consistently a women's 8.5, medium (average) width. I ordered the small and they're just right. Hopefully that is helpful to someone else! Again - good quality, nice fit - happy I chose these for my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: K. Walker

customer_reviews.title: packable :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my trip to the Maldives. I wear a size 8 shoe and I got the pink ones in small. They're really cute and functional. I snorkelled for hours everyday I was on vacation and the fins were actually comfortable. I like that they're shorter because they're easier to pack and I was able to fit mine in my carryon luggage! I'll definitely be taking these on my other beach vacations. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Just received my fins !
customer_reviews.text: I really like them and just tried them out in my pool. They are not snug, a little loose. I take a woman's size 10 so i got the large, i think maybe i should wear a heavy sock, the rubber does rub against the sides of my foot because it is loose but not big enough to fall off. Will have to try again w/ the socks on.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for laps in the pool but they run large.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8 1/2 woman's shoe and ordered these in M (medium) according to the US size chart conversion, but they were too big - very loose all over. I returned the M size fins and got the S (small) size instead. These fit much better. They're still slightly loose, just enough to get on and off easily in the pool but not enough to cause a blister. They're great for laps in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Dave and Katy

customer_reviews.title: Tears at rubber seems very easily
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 pairs, one for myself an one for my wife. My wife's pair got a tear where the solid rubber and soft rubber meet. This happened just from regular (careful) travel in a backpack. Other than that the product worked great. But I don't believe it should tear so easily from one use and one time being packed up for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Smart87

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for cruise
customer_reviews.text: We took these on a recent cruise so we could snorkel from the beach. We also used some light weight booties. They were comfortable and allowed us to explore the offshore area with no problems. They were carried off the ship in a very small lightweight backpack with our mask and snorkel. Of course they are too light weight for scuba. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elbert L. Martin Jr.

customer_reviews.title: i think they are fun and functional
customer_reviews.text: the others wrote about the size relative to their shoe size. I wear a 7 and the small just fit. I was hoping to put my water shoes under them, so the material did not hurt my feet, but they were not big enough for that. they do propel you fast..i think they are fun and functional
customer_reviews.author: jo luth

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: i love the hot pink color and the length is very comfy. it is very durable. i have been using it almost 2-3x a week for maybe 2 mos now. my actual shoe size is 8.5US & i bought 7-8 US, it is still a little loose. i mean it will not slip off when it's all the way in but my feet can move inside the flippers by half an inch or so
customer_reviews.author: Mai Milan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I wore these a handful of times and they are already falling apart. Poorly made and do not work as well as my other ones. Cute designs but not practical.
customer_reviews.author: ALLISON I.

customer_reviews.title: Small was too big for Women’s 7-7.5
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the small. I am a women’s 7-7.5 and thought the small would fit. They were way too big. There was so much room at the top opening around the ankle, like I could have slid my full fist in there. They would have slipped right off my feet in water. Three stars because I liked the styling, colors, and shipping speed.
customer_reviews.author: PukePants

customer_reviews.title: I really like these. I feel like I'm making progress when ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I feel like I'm making progress when swimming laps and I can feel my leg muscles afterwards for sure.
customer_reviews.author: K.G.

customer_reviews.title: They worked great. Fit great - I have along second toe
customer_reviews.text: They worked great. Fit great - I have along second toe, so I really appreciated the open toe. Small for travel and yeah pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: terrific!
customer_reviews.text: These were my first set of flippers and they are great for swimming laps, which I took up with gusto during the summer of COVID-19. My 10-year-old son liked them so much I got him a pair as well. For me, they also helped keep my ankle and knee aligned, which alleviated the cramping I had in my toes. I went up to doing 60 minutes of laps 4-6 times/week.
customer_reviews.author: Maxima

customer_reviews.title: fits nicely in luggage but you don't receive much propulsion from ...
customer_reviews.text: fits nicely in luggage but you don't receive much propulsion from actual end of fin. Im not sure I'd purchase again. In strong ocean currents i'd want a longer more powerful fin. In easy conditions they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: They are well made. I wear them with diving socks. Sizing is good in my experience, with or without socks they fit really well. The bag is a bit narrow, you might want to put them into another for traveling, but that doesn't matter. I like the inserts so I can hang them. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: nyan

customer_reviews.title: Shoe portion of these are big
customer_reviews.text: These fins were very well made, light and nice. However, I did have to return them because the shoe portion was too big and was afraid they would fall off in the water. I wear a women's size 7W shoe and ordered the smallest size and they were too big. Really wanted to keep them, but just could not.
customer_reviews.author: Dkpva

customer_reviews.title: These are not dive fins
customer_reviews.text: These are snorkeling assist fins. These are little fins that will keep you moving slowly when snorkeling. But the main reason we got these was because they are short enough to fit into carry on case for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: execellent!!
customer_reviews.text: l love these fins, i used them by the first time at the lake and they fit well and are super comfortable, no skin friction. I would definitely but again.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Guide Not Correct
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is off. The first pair, Way too big, return them and sized down on the second pair. too BIG as well. I’m a size 8 women’s shoe and the sizing guide is not correct. I bought these for an upcoming cruise I am going on the first week of May this year, and I am unable to return for and exchange because it’s after the return time. Now I am stuck with fins that I cannot use.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Totally met my needs
customer_reviews.text: These swim fins are great for beach side use, as the short length allows for walking forward with ease. They give just enough extra kick to do the job for walking into the water and enjoying the sea life. Very comfortable and a great purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Guy R. Conrad

customer_reviews.title: They do the job
customer_reviews.text: Got these for pool swimming drills and they do the job. Fit was good (not to loose and not too snugged)
customer_reviews.author: Shado

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable! Only lasted 3 1/2 months
customer_reviews.text: Not much for durability used 4 times a week and now have to replace. Purchased 3 1/2 months ago. The rubber edge split 🙁 heartbroken
customer_reviews.author: Ryan W.

customer_reviews.title: These fins have helped me raise the challenge of my ...
customer_reviews.text: These fins have helped me raise the challenge of my workout. They were suggested by a friend who coaches swimmers.
customer_reviews.author: David Nash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit very well, did size down. Stayed perfectly on my feet with vigorous use!
customer_reviews.author: Nouse4aName067

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable. I wear a women's shoe size 10
customer_reviews.text: I swim laps with these, very comfortable. I wear a women's shoe size 10.5 and large fits perfectly. I fly by all the other swimmers!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good size. I'm an 8-8.5 and ordered the small. Used them with and without neoprene socks.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Runs large !
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 6 1/6 and these were swimming on me . Very big! I’m going to have to return them . More like a 7-71/2 ; even though it says 5-6.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Young

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits as expected - helps to know European size easy to put on and get off
customer_reviews.author: S. Hector

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Used them in Florida for snorkeling off the beach. They worked very well! No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Kludolph

customer_reviews.title: work great , good price.
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my wife who is not a strong swimmer and a new to snorkleing they really helped increase her comfort in the water paired with a snorkle inflatable vest with just a little air in it .
customer_reviews.author: Ray L. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: fins started to warp and bend after about a month
customer_reviews.author: William Crawford

customer_reviews.title: great small fins
customer_reviews.text: Manageable, maneuverable, comfortable. Not incredibly powerful (you give up power to gain agility) but that's fine. Cute and they float pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: First of all, they were delivered to the wrong address. To my neighbor who hates me, so I was lucky to see the box and grab it before the took it in. Second, the fins fit wayyyyyy to big. I wear a size 8-8 1/2 woman. Ughhhhh
customer_reviews.author: Ngozi Onyegbulem

customer_reviews.title: Runs large in size
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but run large. Based on the size chart I would wear a large but they are to long. I will be using them in the summer. I hope they work.
customer_reviews.author: K.A.Talley

customer_reviews.title: Small fins for goofing around🤓
customer_reviews.text: Good for snorkeling and their size is easier to deal with while carrying, storing, etc. You can walk in them short distances. Not good for strong powerful strokes and speed like the full size ones.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Vest

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great for pool, thought they were going to be rubbing while swimming as they were loose when I tried them on, but they were totally comfortable and light weight. Would recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Diane R.

customer_reviews.title: but comfortable. My husband's fins we're not the ones we ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two sets of fins, for me and my husband. My fins we're slightly big, but comfortable. My husband's fins we're not the ones we actually ordered. It was a strap instead of a slip on fin. Even though, he decided to keep them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Vardy

customer_reviews.title: Love em!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to swimming but am working towards a goal of completing a triathlon. These really helped me in the pool and especially working on form and getting comfortable with freestyle. Fit great, comfortable, and great portability with the mesh bag!! I don’t write many reviews but these deserve it!!! Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Nice product out of the box. But fell apart after the first time in the ocean. Rubber separated from the plastic fin. Would not give me the power I needed to get out of a outgoing tital current. Felt unsafe. Fit Good though.
customer_reviews.author: randy laskey

customer_reviews.title: Great for snorkeling!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Just what I wanted for snorkeling in Belize. I highly recommend. Easy to pack and lightweight for swimming. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bonton

customer_reviews.title: You'll like these!
customer_reviews.text: Used these in the Bahamas......easy to walk in and they didn't fall off in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Lapdog

customer_reviews.title: Wearing these fins makes for a great workout. They fit well and I enjoy swimming ...
customer_reviews.text: Wearing these fins makes for a great workout. They fit well and I enjoy swimming in them. I am a senior citizen who used to swim competitively.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: My 10y/o son bought for himself after watching a (bunch of) Utube videos. He uses them to swim and snorkel at the river. They fit well and work great don’t hurt or rub blisters on his feet. They seem like they will hold up over time and use also.
customer_reviews.author: melmcelyea

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this purchase. Good quality and met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT STAY ON YOUR FEET
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in August but just tried it in the warm waters of Bermuda and they are not well fitted so that as soon as you go into light surf they fall off. I then tried some underwater swimming with them and they fell right off. I have a normal size 11 feet too! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Okay travel fins
customer_reviews.text: They fit good and appear to made well made but worked okay. Not that much thrust but this is my first set of smaller/travel sized fins
customer_reviews.author: ghostrider

customer_reviews.title: but the fins are awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely go conservative, size 9 here. but the fins are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cute in pink in the water :)
customer_reviews.text: I love them size was right an very comfy an way easier to use then full size fins
customer_reviews.author: nichole pulver

customer_reviews.title: Love them. They work great
customer_reviews.text: Love them. They work great, feel comfortable, and it's MUCH easier to walk in them as they are shorter than traditional fins.
customer_reviews.author: lele dunny

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile swimming aid
customer_reviews.text: Fin size was just right for reducing overall swimming effort. Easy on / off was important.
customer_reviews.author: gl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best pair of swim fins I have ever owned, very, durable, fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Nakajami55

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I wear 10.5 and these were a perfect fit. Easy to get on and off. Light weight making them great for traveling on a plane. Very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Red930turbo

customer_reviews.title: ordered a smaller size and they worked out great.
customer_reviews.text: Was too big for my fiance's feet, even though we followed the guide. No worries, ordered a smaller size and they worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: ToddM

customer_reviews.title: Snorkeling Fins
customer_reviews.text: I bought the fins for my 14yr old. Great quality and fit true to size. He used them to snorkel around the Atlantis. The fins were a perfect length for swimming around the pools. Light weight and easy to pack. Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: jstewflys

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for first-time snorkelers! I had no issue adjusting to these; they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney W.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They rub the toes too hard, to the point of scraping off skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dive Fins work great in the pool
customer_reviews.text: They are a little lose but stay on my feet no problem. Love the color too.
customer_reviews.author: Dan & Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Great starter or travel fins.
customer_reviews.text: Great for starter snorkelers, especially kids. Big enough to give some propulsion in the water, but easy to put on (kids can do it themselves) and maneuver around in, walking, getting in and out of the water. Smaller size for packing too.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Good quality fins
customer_reviews.text: I used these fins one time only so far, they are good quality and fit nicely on me.
customer_reviews.author: lonestar0829

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Big!
customer_reviews.text: Nice fins, made well. I wear a size 6 in women’s shoes. Bought the small and they are large enough for a ladies 7 and they are wide. My boyfriend wears a men’s size 8 and he can squeeze his foot into these.
customer_reviews.author: LMiller

customer_reviews.title: Size Problem
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size medium as my shoe size is woman's 8-8.5. It was way too big and loose. I re ordered a small and will see how that works.
customer_reviews.author: maliamd

customer_reviews.title: Fins Cracked first use
customer_reviews.text: The plastic fins cracked and split the very first time. Really disappointed. Do not buy these. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Headshrinker

customer_reviews.title: Swimming fins
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly. I wear size 8 shoes and order medium. Great fit👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for snorkeling on our cruise
customer_reviews.text: Don’t take up much space. We liked the shoe style better instead of the adjustable back strap. Fit very well, and didn’t need dive socks.
customer_reviews.author: jlsteele38

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the closed heel fin. Fit perfect. I will be using these for snorkeling in Kauai, easy to carry and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn D

customer_reviews.title: Stick with a regular length fin
customer_reviews.text: Can’t flipper anywhere with the short fins. Go for the traditional longer ones and deal with the extra space they take up in your luggage!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E. Lussier

customer_reviews.title: Good Travel Fins
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for me on a recent snorkeling trip. In hindsight, I would have gone with much larger fins (not shoe size, but surface area of the fin). Also, a friend of mine turned me on to the split-fin design (where the fins are split right down the middle). It greatly increases efficiency. But the fins are much larger and more expensive. These here will do the job, they just compromise a lot on efficiency to be easier to travel.
customer_reviews.author: Willie V. HughesTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: liked its length... and ease of use in water. foot size is wide and not snug
customer_reviews.author: Jung

customer_reviews.title: Right choice
customer_reviews.text: Good material, comfortable fit, I am very please with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shoessearcher

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I used these to snorkel in The Bahamas. They fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Clover

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Got my replacement fins very quickly, also recieved a bonus bin of turkish candies that were fruit flavors! They are awsome, are thes available to purchase?
customer_reviews.author: Karyl Merrifield

customer_reviews.title: ANNGO Fin
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. They fit perfectly and did not hurt my heel. They did not slip off and were easy to take off.

product_meta.title: ANGGO Snorkel Fins, Short Diving Swim Fins/Swimming Flippers Lightweight for Adult Kids Men Womens
feature_bullets: 【Updated size chart】– please make sure to use our size chart image to measure your feet to get the perfect size. Note: After use, especially when used in a chlorination pool, please wash our male and female swimming fins to prevent them from breaking. Put them in the heat sink when not in use to keep them in good condition.

【Ankle safety design no longer hurts people】 – our training swimming fins with ankle safety design support can protect swimmers from injury during water sports, because they can provide extra even when encountering winter ocean currents occasionally comfortability.

【Hold our child firmly every time we move】– our child’s water fins use elastic thermoplastic rubber and PP material. When you walk, it provides firm grip, comfort and ensures long swimming. These are very suitable for improving children's speed and making them confident in more advanced skills. If you feel any discomfort while swimming with these rubber fins, please feel free to return them to us for a full refund!

【Maximum safety and comfort】– can provide maximum control and comfort. It can help swimmers swim properly without muscle fatigue. These lightweight fins for boys and girls are super light, do not take up much space, are very easy for children to use, and do not hurt their feet at all. Very suitable for swimming, diving, snorkeling and other water sports!

【Let you swim right away!】 – Use our training fins to provide maximum comfort, control and protection. Recommended for those who are learning to swim by themselves (or floating) and those who already swim, because they provide a little extra attraction to keep them moving. Click the "Add to Cart" button above to enjoy this offer!
